title: What if Neeko transformed herself into another Neeko?
body:
Not looking forward to All for One Gamemode.

http://magaimg.net/img/6rjf.png

replies.body: Wait. If Neeko becomes another Neeko and uses an ability, does it cancel her passive and return her to Neeko A or does she continue as Neeko B

I don't want to know.

I really don't.
League of Legends has stopped responding. Congratulations! You broke the server.
Neeko becomes neeko who became neeko who transformed into neeko who wanted to be Neeko but since neeko is already neeko, neeko had to become neeko.

The Universe will implode.

thanks for breaking the concept of logic, lol.
